subtitleNullable: Listed Animes, Users and Ratings on MyAnimeList (MAL)
descriptionNullable:
🖥️ My Animes List Datasets - 2023 🖥️

Listed Animes, Users and Ratings on MyAnimeList (MAL) ----

📅 Extraction Period 📅

The data was extracted between August 1th in 2023 and October 6th in 2023 via Python Programming Language and using [anime-data-scrapper](https://github.com/CSFelix/anime-data-scrapper) available as a Repository on GitHub. ---

🔐 Dataset File 🔐

anime-dataset-2023.csv

❓ Description ❓

Full dataset containing all listed Animes in MyAnimeList.

📝 Variables 📝

- **Anime ID** - anime id on MyAnimeList; - **Name** - anime original name; - **English Name** - English version name; - **Other Name** - Japanese version name; - **Score** - weighted/Bayesian average score. You can check out for more details at ["How are MyAnimeList scores calculated?"](https://myanimelist.net/info.php?go=topanime); - **Genres** - related genres; - **Synopsis** - briefly description; - **Type** - type of animation (movie, anime, OVA...); - **Episodes** - number of episodes. Movies are considered having 1 episode; - **Aired** - period when anime was aired; - **Premiered** - season when the anime was released; - **Status** - current status (airing, hiatus, finished...); - **Producers** - related production companies; - **Licensors** - related streaming platforms and licensors; - **Studios** - related animation studios; - **Source** - source material of the anime (originated from manga, light novel, movie or tv); - **Duration** - duration of the movie or each episode; - **Rating** - age restriction; - **Rank** - rank position on MyAnimeList website (based on Score criteria); - **Popularity** - popularity position on MyAnimeList; - **Favorites** - number of users that marked the anime as favorite; - **Scored By** - number of users that rated the anime; - **Members** - number of users that added the anime to the watch list; - **Image Url** - banner url. ----

🔐 Dataset File 🔐

users-details-2023.csv

❓ Description ❓

Full dataset containing all users in MyAnimeList.

📝 Variables 📝

- **Mal ID** - user id; - **Username** - nickname; - **Gender** - user gender; - **Birthday** - birthday; - **Location** - user's location or country; - **Joined** - the joined date on MyAnimeList Platform (ISO format); - **Days Watched** - total number of days the user spent on MyAnimeList; - **Mean Score** - the average score the user gives to the watched animes; - **Watching** - number of animes currently being watched by the user; - **Completed** - number of animes finished by the user; - **On Hold** - number of animes that the user stopped watching but kept it into its list; - **Dropped** - number of animes that the user stopped watching and removed from its list; - **Plan to Watch** - number of animes that the user has added into the list but did not started watching; - **Total Entries** - total number of animes into the user's list; - **Rewatched** - number of animes rewatched; - **Episodes Watched** - number of episodes watched from all animes. ----

🔐 Dataset File 🔐

users-score-2023.csv

❓ Description ❓

Full dataset containing all ratings from all users on MyAnimeList.

📝 Variables 📝

- **User ID** - user id on MyAnimeList Platform; - **Username** - nickname; - **Anime ID** - anime id on MyAnimeList Platform; - **Anime Title** - anime original name; - **Rating** - score that the user rated the anime. ----

🔐 Dataset File 🔐

./benchmark/full-benchmark.csv

❓ Description ❓

Data about all Recommendation System Algorithms' performances.

📝 Variables 📝

- **Iteration** - iteration running number; - **Algorithm** - filtering recommendation and data basis approach; - **Execution Time** - execution time in seconds; - **Average CPU Usage** - average CPU usage in percent over the iteration; - **Minimum CPU Usage** - minimum CPU usage in percent over the iteration; - **Maximum CPU Usage** - maximum CPU usage in percent over the iteration; - **Average RAM Usage** - average RAM usage in percent over the iteration; - **Minimum RAM Usage** - minimum RAM usage in percent over the iteration; - **Maximum RAM Usage** - maximum RAM usage in percent over the iteration. ----

🔐 Others Datasets 🔐

All others datasets has been created from one of the three previous ones. ----

🎉 Acknowledgements 🎉

Thanks to: 1. [Sajid](https://www.kaggle.com/dbdmobile) for providing the [Anime Dataset 2023](https://www.kaggle.com/datasets/dbdmobile/myanimelist-dataset) that inspired this whole dataset. ----

⚖️ Dataset License ⚖️

MIT License More details are available on the [Open Source Initiative - The MIT License](https://opensource.org/license/mit/).
